医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
无线、生物可吸收、无源传感器，用于连续 pH 监测和早期识别胃渗漏一种可生物吸收的无线无源传感器，可局部监测 pH 值并及早检测胃渗漏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Wireless-bioresorbable-passive-sensor-for-continuous-pH-monitoring-and-early-identification-of-stomach-leakage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Wireless-bioresorbable-passive-sensor-for-continuous-pH-monitoring-and-early-identification-of-stomach-leakage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a778ecf7-8d82-426b-8498-20d1699b609b Tue, 30 Apr 2024 05:31:00 -0400 Wireless, bioresorbable, passive sensor for continuous pH monitoring and early identification of stomach leakage
AI-MARRVEL：遗传性疾病诊断的一次飞跃，准确率超过 98%用于识别孟德尔疾病的知识驱动型 MARRVEL 基于人工智能的模型 (AIM)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/AI-MARRVEL-A-leap-forward-in-diagnosing-genic-diseases-with-over-9825- precision.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/AI-MARRVEL-A-leap-forward-in-diagnosing-genic-diseases-with-over-9825- precision.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=92d1f071-4f62-4e27-b5a8-a78092cff65a Tue, 30 Apr 2024 05:12:00 -0400 AI-MARRVEL: A leap forward in diagnosing genetic diseases with over 98% precision
Asimov 将慢病毒生产提高 10 倍，推出新的稳定细胞系开发服务https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Asimov-achieves-10x-improvement-in-慢病毒-生产-launches-new-stable-cell-line-development-service.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Asimov-achieves-10x-improvement-in-lentiviral-product-launches-new-stable-cell-line-development-service.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75342fed-2d32-4cca-acdf-94c065b93b9c Tue, 30 Apr 2024 01:04:00 -0400 Asimov achieves 10x improvement in lentiviral production, launches new stable cell line development service
研究调查了新生儿维生素 D 对成年期湿疹的潜在影响澳大利亚研究人员发现，新生儿维生素 D 水平较高与早发持续性湿疹的几率较低相关，但 25 岁以下儿童早发湿疹消退的风险增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-investigates-the-potential-effects-of-neonatal-vitamin-D-on-eczema-up-to-adulthood.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-investigates-the-pottial-effects-of-neonatal-vitamin-D-on-eczema-up-to-adulthood.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1e3badd-8eb2-4ecd-ae92-aaa323c48ef6 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 00:42:00 -0400 Study investigates the potential effects of neonatal vitamin D on eczema up to adulthood
研究表明儿童食物多样性较差与较高的健康成本有关研究强调了食物多样性低对儿童健康和经济成本的负面影响，强调需要改善饮食多样性以减少医疗费用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-links-poor-food-diversity-in-children-to-higher-health-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Study-links-poor-food-diversity-in-children-to-higher-health-costs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71831817-dd63-49b7-b50f-925a421e552f Tue, 30 Apr 2024 00:16:00 -0400 Study links poor food diversity in children to higher health costs
迷幻化合物有望缓解社交攻击性小鼠的压力《神经药理学》的一项研究表明，单剂量的迷幻化合物 (R)-DOI 可以显着改善遭受社会攻击的小鼠的压力应对行为并减少炎症标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Psychedelic-compound-shows-promise-in-stress-relief-for-socially-aggressive-mice.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240430/Psychedelic-compound-shows-promise-in-stress-relief-for-socially-aggressive-mice.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fe555e80-1a13-461e-b783-b004e79ae874 Tue, 30 Apr 2024 00:01:00 -0400 Psychedelic compound shows promise in stress relief for socially aggressive mice
更新的疫苗可针对先前和新出现的 SARS-CoV-2 变种提供强大的免疫反应使用活 SARS-CoV-2 病毒的新研究表明，更新的疫苗可针对以前的毒株和新出现的变种提供强大的免疫反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Updated-vaccine-provides-strong-immune-response-against-previous-and-emerging-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/Updated-vaccine-provides-strong-immune-response-against-previous-and-emerging-SARS-CoV-2-variants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c6e06d3f-16f0-46e5-a040-b18784b9bbb9 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 23:48:44 -0400 Updated vaccine provides strong immune response against previous and emerging SARS-CoV-2 variants
研究发现，HPV 疫苗接种率随着入学要求的增加而增加维克森林大学医学院研究人员的一项新研究表明，入学要求与人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 疫苗接种的增加有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/HPV-vaccination-rates-increase-with-school-entry-requirements-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/HPV-vaccination-rates-increase-with-school-entry-requirements-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4482d59e-70e7-4127-8841-bff397fe4ced Mon, 29 Apr 2024 23:44:18 -0400 HPV vaccination rates increase with school entry requirements, study finds
研究警告说，新的 SARS-CoV-2 KP.2 变种无法抵抗具有更高传播范围的疫苗bioRxiv 服务器的研究报告称，SARS-CoV-2 KP.2 变种尽管传染性较低，但与其他变种相比表现出显着的免疫抵抗力和更高的传播性，可能会影响全球公共卫生和疫苗功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/New-SARS-CoV-2-KP2-variant-defies-vaccines-with-higher-spread-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/New-SARS-CoV-2-KP2-variant-defies-vaccines-with-higher-spread-study-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31cf6c5a-7aec-496a-8c5d-442e192fac7d Mon, 29 Apr 2024 23:43:00 -0400 New SARS-CoV-2 KP.2 variant defies vaccines with higher spread, study warns
使用 CRISPR 进行 RNA 编辑显示出治疗遗传病的希望蒙大拿州立大学的一个团队本周发表了一项研究，展示了如何使用 CRISPR 编辑 RNA（DNA 的化学近亲）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/RNA-editing-using-CRISPRs-shows-promise-for-genic-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240429/RNA-editing-using-CRISPRs-shows-promise-for-genic-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c39aca24-ecb9-4786-91db-efa79066a791 Mon, 29 Apr 2024 23:38:12 -0400 RNA editing using CRISPRs shows promise for genetic disease treatment
